creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: flat plaque with large curlicues dangling on each side; attached to neck piece with "S" shaped pieces; thick wire neck piece ends in curlicues; double fish medallion with dragon on each side on plaque; flat, hand-like piece with triangle dangles from center
dimension: 11 5/16 x 8 1/2 x 1/2 in. (28.73 x 21.59 x 1.27 cm) (including dangles)
title: Torque
